name: payum/payum-module
description: Zend Framework 2 Module for Payum payment lib

suggest.payum/paypal-express-checkout-nvp: If you want to use paypal express checkout nvp gateway
suggest.payum/paypal-pro-checkout-nvp: If you want to use paypal pro checkout nvp gateway
suggest.payum/authorize-net-aim: If you want to use authorize.net gateway
suggest.payum/be2bill: If you want to use be2bill gateway
suggest.payum/payex: If you want to use payex gateway
suggest.payum/omnipay-bridge: If you want to use omnipay provided gateways
